XIII.i.2.A.1.h
.
Terminating Entitlement to Automobile and Adaptive Equipment Allowance
At the time a decision is authorized that rescinds or terminates a Veteran’s eligibility for the automobile and adaptive equipment allowance, claims processors must notify the Veterans Health Administration (VHA) Prosthetic and Sensory Aids Service (PSAS).
Send e-mail notification, with a copy of the rating decision
Narrative
and
Codesheet
, to VHA-PSAS (
VHAPSASBenefits@va.gov
) and upload the e-mail to the Veteran’s claims folder.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A - Automobile and Adaptive Equipment Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. Chapter 39
